text: @realDonaldTrump @SecretarySonny @ZippyDuvall Socialism at its finest! @marcorubio will applaud this form of socialism while decrying unemployment and healthcare benefits to the poor. Your incompetence with the China tariffs and COVID-19 response cannot be bribed away. This is socialist hush money but farmers worth >$150k!
